authority-number-renew-vary.header: What are your customer reference and current authority numbers?
authority-number-renew-vary.summary-header: How can I find the customer reference and authority numbers?
authority-number-renew-vary.details: Your customer reference number can be found beneath the address on your authority letter. The authority number can be found at the bottom left of the letter.

weapons.important: Only in certain circumstances, such as transporting prohibited items under seal, should you select the unspecified option or leave the maximum quantity questions blank.
weapons.helper: Select all that apply and state the maximum quantities held at any one time. If the sections and quantities aren't backed up by the evidence provided, it may delay the application or result in the authority not being approved.

ammunition.important: Only in certain circumstances, such as transporting prohibited items under seal, should you select the unspecified option or leave the maximum quantity questions blank.
ammunition.helper: Select all that apply and state the maximum quantities held at any one time. If the sections and quantities aren't backed up by the evidence provided, it may delay the application or result in the authority not being approved.

storageAddresses.legend: The police will inspect each address used for storage

supporting-documents.intro: You must provide evidence to justify the types and quantities of prohibited items requested, and show how they’ll be obtained and used.

invoice-address.intro: We will only use this to send your invoice.

invoice-contact-details.header: Who should we contact about the invoice?

subject.customer: Your email confirmation - application to handle prohibited weapons, components or ammunition

customer: This email confirms receipt of your application to handle prohibited weapons, components or ammunition. We will review the application, and get back to you at this email address if we require further information.

If sufficient information and suitable evidence has been provided, we’ll instruct the local police force to make enquiries on behalf of the Secretary of State. In this case, the police will contact you regarding security inspections and interviews.
The decision on your application is pending. This email is not a certificate of authority.
If you need to contact us about this application, or believe you have received this email by mistake, contact the Home Office's firearms licensing unit using the details below.
